name: Fuck Bold Badgers
description: This piece of art symbolizes the scam that was the Bold Badger NFT event. An event where regular people simply could not access and mint the announced NFT's while the friends and associates of the creators of the Bold Badger NFT were getting all the artworks. It was an evident attempt at ramping up the price of their NFT through the hype they created, however people that genuinely wanted to mint one couldn't.
